name: Belln City
description:
Welcome to Belln City

I was inspired by the Initial D anime series so I made this game. It's a racing game where you have to finish levels before the time ends. The game has a short story.

It is still a demo, and I intend to finish the game in the future. The game should work on any low-end system. In the settings, you can change the quality and resolution.

In the selection menu, you will see in the down left corner pretty basic instructions.

When the game is fully completed and published, anyone that donated 1,50 or above will get the game automatically. Any donations from you guys will be helpful and every donation I get will be spent on finishing this game.

I hope you like the game and I am looking forward to hearing your opinions on the game.
